name: Beucephalus
languages: understands Abyssal, Common, and Infernal but can't speak

trait.name: Confer Fire Resistance
text: Beucephalus can grant resistance to fire damage to anyone riding it.

trait.name: Illumination
text: Beucephalus sheds bright light in a 10-foot radius and dim light for an additional 10 feet.

action.name: Hooves
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage plus 7 (2d6) fire damage.

action.name: Ethereal Stride
text: Beucephalus and up to three willing creatures within 5 feet of it magically enter the Ethereal Plane from the Material Plane, or vice versa.
